DOC.brief_summary: Material for caries prevention dont have better results compared with non-operatory interventions.
DOC.brief_title: Resin Infiltratration on the Sealing of Proximal Early Caries
DOC.detailed_description: Two gruops will be compared. One using ICON and another gruop with non-operatory interventions consisted in hygiene instrutions and fluoride topical application. The caries progression will be evalueted with radiographic observation.
DOC.criteria: Two early caries lesion in the same patient, lesion with the same radiolucencies images Pregnancy, use of orthodontics appliences, use of drugs modified salivar flow, ausence of adjacent teeth
